name: Midi & Melody
description:
Midi's really gotten himself in trouble this time. From being pelted with explosives to dashing through a water and lava purification plant, there's nothing this cat won't do to save the world, even if he is a little under-powered. Follow Midi through this speed, yet perilous journey to stop Professor Phosphor!

!!PLEASE NOTE!!

This is a demo, you absolutely will not be forced to pay, but donations to help the game along would be awesome! 

Don't forget to check out my:
Discord server: https://discord.gg/M9aChwx
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MakeshiftKazoo

While you're at it, check out Gabe and Dolphman's twitter too!
Dolphman: https://twitter.com/Dolphman2017
Gabe'sShenanigans: https://twitter.com/GabeShenanigans

And check out the OST here: https://soundcloud.com/makeshift-kazoo-studios/sets/midi-melody-sage-2020-demo-o...
